channel.title: Staff login message, help plz

item.title: Staff login message, help plz
item.dc:creator: @Aesyr Aesyr
item.description:
@Aesyr wrote:

xBeezy:

yes when they login [ Owner ] Beezy has logged in.

Go find the normal login messages, and add an “if” statement to decide whether or not the person is an owner, and in the case that they are, display the persons name in the message. This way, if you decide to switch accounts, you won’t have to bother with changing the name, just the rights.

Here is an example:

//normal login shit if (c.playerRights >= 3) { //send a message to all in this format: "[Owner] " + c.playerName + " has logged in." //do anything else you want it to do if an owner logs in }

I suppose this is project insanity, so I forget how to send the message to all.

Read full topic
